statements: DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE is_active = true
DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE is_active = true AND policy_name = 'Sensitive Policy';
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE status = 'Non-compliant' AND record_type = 'Audit';
DELETE FROM RemoteWorkOperations WHERE operation_name = 'Remote Access';
DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 10 AND policy_name = 'Restricted Access';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE worker_id = 1002 AND action = 'login' AND accessed_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE performed_by = 'John Doe';
